posts.post_content:
This is another card from a collection I'm selling that was tucked away for the past 30-40 years by an old-school collector.

Hall of Famer Pud Galvin, pose 177-4. Card is skinned. 

Price is $xxxx delivered within the United States.

Check or money order preferred; PayPal is OK.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation.  :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com [/URL]
